narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Ohioans Home Healthcare, Inc. is a Home Health provider based in Monroe, MI. From 2018-07 through 2018-12, this provider received $72K in Medicaid payments across 1K claims serving 281 beneficiaries, billing 3 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 80% of billing is concentrated in G0299 (G0299), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2018-12, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
